Verses: 1 appozhudhu Yoodhaa Janangal Ellaarum Padhinaaru Vayadhaana Usiyaavai Azhaiththuvandhu, Avanai Avan Thagappanaagiya Amadhsiyaavin Sthaanaththile Raajaavaakkinaargal.
2 raajaa Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapinbu, Ivan Elodhaik Katti, Adhaith Thirumba Yoodhaavin Vasamaakkikkondaan.
3 usiyaa Raajaavaagirapodhu, Padhinaaru Vayadhaayirundhu, Aimbaththirandu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Erusalem Nagaraththaalaana Avan Thaayinper Ekkoliyaal.
4 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Amadhsiyaa Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhu,
5 dhevanudaiya Dharisanangalil Buththimaanaayirundha Sagariyaavin Naatkalile Dhevanaith Theda Manadhinangiyirundhaan; Avan Karththaraith Thedina Naatkalil Dhevan Avan Kaariyangalai Vaaikka Seydhaar.

6 avan Purappattuppoi, Pelistharodu Yuththampanni, Kaaththin Alangaththaiyum, Yapneyin Alangaththaiyum, Asthoththin Alangaththaiyum Idiththuppottu, Asthodh Naattilum Pelistharukkullum Pattanangalaik Kattinaan.
7 pelistharaiyum Koorpaagaalile Kudiyirukkira Arabiyaraiyum Meguniyaraiyum Vella, Dhevan Avanukkuth Thunainindraar.
8 ammoniyar Usiyaavukkuk Kaanikkaigalaik Koduththaargal; Avanudaiya Keerththi Egipthin Ellaimattum Ettinadhu; Avan Migavum Belankondaan.
9 usiyaa Erusalemile Moolaivaasalmelum, Pallaththaakku Vaasalmelum, Alangaththuk Kodigalmelum Koburangalaik Katti Avaigalai Balappaduththinaan.

10 avanukkup Pallaththaakkilum Samaboomiyilum Anegam Aadumaadugalum, Malaigalileyum Vayalveliyileyum Payirkkudigalum, Dhraatchaththottakkaararum Undaayirundhapadiyinaal, Avan Vanaandharaththile Koburangalaik Katti, Anega Thuravugalai Vettinaan; Avan Vellaanmaip Piriyanaayirundhaan.

11 usiyaavukku Yuththaveerarin Senaiyumirundhadhu; Adhu Sambiradhiyaagiya Eyelinaalum Aadhikkakkaaranaagiya Maaseyaavinaalum Lakkampaarkkappattapadiye, Raajaavin Prabukkalil Oruvanaagiya Ananiyaavinkeezh Vaguppu Vaguppaai Sevagampannap Purappattadhu.
12 paraakkiramasaaligalaana Vamsaththalaivarin Thogaiyellaam Irandaayiraththu Arunooru.
13 ivargal Kaiyinkeezh Saththurukkalukku Virodhamaaga Raajaavukkuth Thunainirka, Paraakkiramaththode Yuththampannugira Moondrulatchaththu Ezhaayiraththu Ainnooruperaana Senai Irundhadhu.
14 indha Senaiyilullavarukkellaam Usiyaa Kedagangalaiyum, Eettigalaiyum, Thalaichcheeraakkalaiyum, Maarkkavasangalaiyum, Villugalaiyum, Kallerigira Kavangalaiyum Aayaththappaduththinaan.

15 koburangalmelum Alangakkodigalmelum Nindru Ambugalaiyum Periya Karkalaiyum Prayogikkiradharku Nibunaraana Thozhilaaligal Karpiththa Yandhirangalaiyum Avan Erusalemil Undaakkinaan; Appadiye Avan Keerththi Vegudhooram Parampitru; Avan Balappadumattum Aachchariyamaai Avanukku Anugoolamundaayitru.

16 avan Balappattapodhu, Thanakkukkedundaagumattum, Avanudaiya Manammettimaiyaagi, Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Meerudhal Seydhu Thoobapeedaththinmel Thoobankaatta Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkul Pravesiththaan.
17 aasaariyanaagiya Asariyaavum, Avanodekoodak Karththarin Aasaariyaraana Paraakkiramasaaligalaagiya Enbadhuperum, Avan Pirage Utpravesiththu,

18 raajaavaagiya Usiyaavodu Edhirththunindru: Usiyaave, Karththarukkuth Thoobankaattugiradhu Umakku Aduththadhalla; Thoobankaattugiradhu Parisuththamaakkappatta Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Aasaariyarukke Adukkum; Parisuththa Sthalaththai Vittuveliye Pom; Meerudhal Seydheer; Idhu Dhevanaagiya Karththaraale Umakku Menmaiyaaga Labiyaadhu Endraargal.

19 appozhudhu Usiyaa Kobankondaan; Avan Thoobakalasaththaith Than Kaiyile Pidiththu, Aasaariyarode Kobamaaip Pesugirapodhu Aasaariyarukku Munbaagakkarththarudaiya Aalayaththile Thoobapeedaththin Munnirkira Avanudaiya Netriyile Kushtarogam Thondritru.

20 pradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Asariyaavum Sagala Aasaariyarum Avanaip Paarkkumpodhu, Idho, Avan Than Netriyile Kushtarogam Pidiththavanendrukandu, Avanaith Theeviramaai Angirundhu Velippadappanninaargal; Karththar Thannai Adiththadhinaal Avan Thaanum Veliyepogath Theevirappattaan.

21 raajaavaagiya Usiyaa Than Marananaalmattum Kushtarogiyaayirundhu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkup Purambaakkappattapadiyinaal, Oru Thaniththa Veettile Kushtarogiyaai Vaasampanninaan; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yodhaam Raajaavin Aramanai Visaarippukkaaranaayirundhu, Dhesaththin Janangalai Nyaayamvisaariththaan.
22 usiyaavin Aadhiyodandha Nadapadiyaana Matra Varththamaanangalai Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Ennum Theerkkadharisi Ezhudhinaan.

23 usiyaa Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapinbu, Janangal Avanaik Kushtarogiyendru Solli, Avanai Avan Pidhaakkalandaiyil, Raajaakkalai Adakkampannugira Idaththirku Arugaana Nilaththile Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yodhaam Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
